title: Alberto Martinez
text: Fast learner scientist with 15 years of experience translating consumer needs into irresistible products using great experiments, data, models and AI.

title: About
text: Alberto Martinez is a Group Scientist at Procter and Gamble focused on data driven product and process design. It is an strong passionate of using data to solve business problems. When is not trying to solve a new industrial challenge he is running around Brussels forests or enjoying time with his 3 kids and wife.
